weekly_top_story.headline: House Lawmakers Unveil Bipartisan Framework to Extend ACA Subsidies
weekly_top_story.summary: A bipartisan group of House lawmakers released a framework proposing a two-year extension of Affordable Care Act premium subsidies with an income eligibility cap, aiming to prevent millions from losing enhanced tax credits amid a federal shutdown and escalating healthcare costs.

stories.headline: FDA Approves First Drug For Kids' Irritable Bowel Syndrome With Constipation
stories.summary: The FDA approved the first-ever drug specifically for children with irritable bowel syndrome (IBS) and constipation, marking a significant advancement in pediatric gastrointestinal care.
stories.source: MedPage Today via KFF Health News
